marklogic.body: I hope Current reads this. AND I still believe that Gore won and would have been the best Presidentual Choice. However Oberman is the lead dog in National Political News. I Like Spitzer, but he ain't Shultz, I Like Shultz but He ain't Oberman. Maybe if you want the best you have to put up with a little crap. If Oberman shows up on another netwark everone else loses, on that time slot, including if he shows up on the internet. If the arguement is that he wouldn't cover the Republican Primaries, the only reason to cover them is to see what idiocy the audiece came up with from booing a vet to Cheering the death penelity. Oberman hit the high Spots and when on with the s--- that the Repugs were pulling behind the scenes. The only failing of Obermans was not enough coverage of Wisconsin and Walker. Other then that, hes the top dog. Hire him back before someone else does.
